author: Austin Morgan
title: The Buzz on Caffeine: Four Coffee Popups Worth the Hype
description: Micro companies are on a mission to serve D.C. residents and visitors the perfect cup of coffee.

author: Emma Dukes
title: Exciting new Australasian coffee and cocktail bar MANUKA to open in Liverpool city centre
description: Freshly baked pastries, specialty coffee and smoothies are on the menu.

author: Sebastian Kanally
title: Osoyoos coming together with donations to support Eagle Bluff Wildfire effort (Oliver/Osoyoos)
description: Donations have been coming in from all directions to support the ongoing battle with the Eagle Bluff Wildfire near Osoyoos. Junction 3 Coffee House and Queen of the South Charcuterie is one duo that has teamed up to take donations to feed and provide coffee and refreshments for firefighters. Sara va...

author: Victoria Giardina, Sophie Cannon
title: The 17 best mini fridges for dorms, basements and more in 2023
description: From storing dining hall leftovers to bottled iced coffees, mini-fridges are a must.

author: Shannon Thaler
title: UK coffee chain Costa slammed over trans ad showing surfer with mastectomy scars
description: Coffeehouse chain Costa is facing fierce backlash on social media over a cartoon advert that features a transgender man with scars reminiscent of ones after receiving double mastectomy.

author: Laura Sharman
title: Costa Coffee defends mural of post-op trans man after boycott threat
description: Costa Coffee included a transgender person with mastectomy scars in a cartoon advert

author: Carly Kulzer
title: This Compact Coffee Maker That's a 'Perfect Fit' for Dorm Rooms Is at Its Lowest Price This Year
description: Over 26,000 shoppers love it.

author: Bryn Mabey
title: Stunning Sussex garden to host summer charity event on Wednesday 16 August 2023
description: Bates Green Garden is opening its doors and inviting people of all ages to enjoy coffee and cake, and an afternoon tea, in support of an Eastbourne-based educational charity.The stunning Sussex garden will host this relaxed, family-friendly event on Wednesday 16 August 2023 between 10am and 4pm.

author: Elizabeth McSheffrey
title: Downtown Vancouver coffee shop closing, ‘fed up’ with rising crime
description: John Neate, CEO of JJ Bean Coffee Roasters, said he's "fed up with the neighbourhood" and has reached a deal with his landlord to end the location's lease early, at a price.

author: Caiti McGowan
title: She Screamed At Her Dad For Trying To Make Her Not Eat Certain Things Her Pregnant Stepmom Can’t Enjoy
description: This 15-year-old girl lives with her father and her stepmother, Anna, who is currently five months pregnant. Right now, a lot of foods are making Anna feel nauseous, especially coffee, anything sugary, Mexican food, and Thai food. The only meat that Anna can eat at the moment is chicken because the smell of any other […]

author: Elizabeth Gregory,Nick Clark and Dominique Hines
title: The best free exhibitions in London – get your culture fix and keep your money for coffee
description: Want to have a fun day out but also save those pennies? These free London art exhibitions are perfect

author: Erin Silvia
title: Michael Jordan & Wife Yvette Prieto Soak In Romantic Views Of St. Tropez On Yacht Vacation
description: The basketball legend was seen enjoying a cigar and coffee as he took in gorgeous sights with his spouse of 10 years.

author: BusinessWorld
title: PSE adds Figaro, CREIT, Raslag to sector indices
description: THE Philippine Stock Exchange (PSE) is adding three newly listed companies to the composition of sector indices but is keeping unchanged the 30-constituent main index, it said over the weekend. In a media release, the exchange said Figaro Coffee Group, Inc., Citicore Energy REIT Corp. (CREIT), and Raslag Corp., which held their initial public offering […]

author: Caiti McGowan
title: She Screamed At Her Mother-In-Law And Kicked Her Out of Her House Over Coffee
description: This 27-year-old woman is currently five months pregnant with twins, and due to a pre-existing medical condition that she has, her pregnancy has been more difficult than most. She is on an early pregnancy leave so that she is able to stay home and get some rest. However, there are a lot of things around […]

author: Caitlin Murray
title: How coffee is bringing the USWNT together at 2023 World Cup
description: The USWNT players at the World Cup share their obsession with coffee, and how java brings the team together.

title: Why it’s so hard to get a coffee in Melbourne after 3pm
